snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include a break down of how N.S.A. contractor Edward Snowden’s e-mail service came to its end. Plus, an interview with an antivirus pioneer about his new so-called anti-N.S.A. device.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the Web include a break down of how N.S.A. contractor Edward Snowden’s e-mail service came to its end. Plus, an interview with an antivirus pioneer about his new so-called anti-N.S.A. device.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The Demise of Lavabit, and an Interview With John McAfee
